mapper.insert: insert into rsvds RSV_CODE, RSV_MEMNICKNAME, RSV_TIME, RSV_DATE, RSV_COUNT, RSV_HOLE, RSV_CADDY, RSV_CLOTHES, RSV_SHOES, RSV_STATUS, RSV_PRICE) values (RSV_CODE.NEXTVAL ,'name', '0000', '20230101', '8', '18', '3', '5', '8', 'T', '0')
mapper.update: UPDATE RSVDS SET rsv_nickname = #{memNickname}, rsv_time = #{rsvTime}, rsv_date = #{rsvDate}, rsv_count = #{rsvCount}, rsv_hole = #{rsvHole}, rsv_caddy = #{rsvCaddy}, rsv_clothes = #{rsvClothes}, rsv_shoes = #{rsvShoes}, rsv_price = #{rsvPrice} WHERE RSV_CODE = #{rsvCode}
mapper.select: select count(*) from timeslots where ti_date = #{ti_date} and ti_time = #{ti_time}
select ti_code, ti_date, ti_time from timeslots where ti_code = #{ti_code}, ti_date = #{ti_date}, ti_time = #{ti_time}
SELECT t.ti_date AS tidate, t.ti_time AS titime FROM timeslots t LEFT JOIN rsvds r ON t.ti_date = r.rsv_date WHERE r.rsv_date IS NULL AND t.ti_date = #{ti_date} AND t.ti_time = #{ti_time}
